programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Take a journey into the beyond with Walter Lloyd and the After Dark crew Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400

programme.title: AFTER DARK
programme.desc: If so, AFTER DARK is for you. Join Walter Lloyd on an intimate tour of the cosmos, right from your bed...at night. Duration: 14400

programme.title: UFO's in the News
programme.desc: From aircraft carriers to nuclear submarines, unidentified aerial phenomenon are being seen at alarming rates around the world. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Commercial Space
programme.desc: Rwanda builds a Space Agency, NASA hikes their rates, building a Space Hotel and the perils of commercialization of space. Duration: 3600

programme.title: War Space
programme.desc: From Farming to mining asteroids, nearly every industry is moving commerce into space...even the military. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Dawn of Polaris
programme.desc: With Oxygen on the Moon, a new Lunar Economy is emerging as the commercial space industry begins to blossom. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Enter the Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Visuals, music, and movies from the new space revolution Duration: 3600

programme.title: Our Cosmic Connection to Music
programme.desc: The Big Bang, a video that was conceived and the music composed by Glenna Burmer, covers the 13.8 billion years of our Universe's history, from before the beginning to today. Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: Turns out, Sky Sharks are entirely possible and the best light saber fights happen in video games! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Spaced Out!
programme.desc: After exploring remote corners of Planet Earth, living with indigenous tribes, surviving dangerous slums and working with societal skyscrapers, Sarah has taken her adventurous missions to a whole new level as she looks to the sky and space for her next phase of exploration. Maybe she is the one to make contact with alien civilizations? Or unearth and pioneer new discoveries and developments within the space industry. Find out... Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Paradise
programme.desc: Host Sarah Begum shows us the way to experience the awe inspiring beauty of the universe, right here on earth. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 10800
